attributes.action: Extend Advents Calendars to start on the 1st of November.
attributes.additional_details: We hope this can help to ease social tensions between people and that we can enjoy all this seasons events such as Eid Al-Adha, Hanukkah, Divali and Christmas.
attributes.background: As the festivities of Halloween end and the festive season starts, this is a time of celebration of groups of people coming together and embracing their cultures.In this era of political and social division I feel that we all need a longer time of solidarity to come together and celebrate eachother.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for Advent Calendars.
